mapper.select: select s.`fid` fid,s.`fspe_num` welderid,s.finitial finitial,s.fcontroller fcontroller,s.fselect insname,s.farc weldername,s.fcharacter fweld_v_max,s.fmode fmode,s.fmaterial updatename,s.fgas fback,s.fweldingratio weldingratio,s.fdiameter fname,s.ftime,s.fhysteresis,s.fadvance,s.fini_ele ,s.fini_vol,s.fini_vol1,s.fweld_ele,s.fweld_vol,s.fweld_vol1,s.farc_ele,s.farc_vol,s.farc_vol1,s.fweld_tuny_ele,s.fweld_tuny_vol,s.farc_tuny_ele,s.farc_tuny_vol fdiameter,s.ffrequency frequency,s.fgasflow gasflow,s.fwater_cooled_torch ftorch,fwelding_process fprocessid, point_speed,pulse_ratio,thrust_ele,decline_time,rise_time,fweldparameters,pulse,arc_length,manual_weld,fargon,Base_vol1,Base_vol,Base_ele,hand_ele,Rush,handarc_time,handarc_ele,farc_time,firsttime FROM tb_specification s where 1=1 AND s.`fmachine_id`=#{machine} AND s.`fspe_num`=#{chanel} ORDER by s.fid

select tb_mainwps.FID fid,tb_mainwps.FWPSNum fwpsnum,tb_mainwps.Fweld_I fweld_i,tb_mainwps.Fweld_V fweld_v,tb_mainwps.Fweld_I_MAX fweld_i_max,tb_mainwps.Fweld_I_MIN fweld_i_min,tb_mainwps.Fweld_V_MAX fweld_v_max,tb_mainwps.Fweld_V_MIN fweld_v_min,tb_mainwps.Fweld_Alter_I fweld_alter_i,tb_mainwps.Fweld_Alter_V fweld_alter_v,tb_mainwps.Fweld_PreChannel fweld_prechannel,tb_mainwps.FCReateDate fcreatedate,tb_mainwps.FUpdateDate fupdatedate,tb_mainwps.Fowner fowner,tb_mainwps.Fback fback,tb_mainwps.Fname fname,tb_mainwps.Fdiameter fdiameter from tb_mainwps where tb_mainwps.FID=#{fid}

select s.`fid` fid,s.`fspe_num` fwpsnum,d1.fvaluename finitial,d2.fvaluename fcontroller,d3.fvaluename insname,d4.fvaluename weldername,s.fcharacter fweld_v_max,d5.fvaluename fmode,d7.fvaluename updatename,d8.fvaluename fback,d9.fvaluename fname,s.fini_ele ,s.fini_vol,s.fini_vol1,s.fweld_ele,s.fweld_vol,s.fweld_vol1,s.farc_ele,s.farc_vol,s.farc_vol1,s.fweld_tuny_ele,s.fweld_tuny_vol,s.farc_tuny_ele,s.farc_tuny_ele fdiameter FROM tb_specification s INNER JOIN tb_dictionary d1 ON d1.fvalue=s.finitial INNER JOIN tb_dictionary d2 ON d2.fvalue=s.fcontroller INNER JOIN tb_dictionary d3 ON d3.fvalue=s.fselect INNER JOIN tb_dictionary d4 ON d4.fvalue=s.farc INNER JOIN tb_dictionary d5 ON d5.fvalue=s.fmode INNER JOIN tb_dictionary d7 ON d7.fvalue=s.fmaterial INNER JOIN tb_dictionary d8 ON d8.fvalue=s.fgas INNER JOIN tb_dictionary d9 ON d9.fvalue=s.fdiameter WHERE s.`fid`=#{fid}
select count(*) from tb_mainwps where FWPSNum=#{fwpsnum}
select users_insframework insid from tb_users where id=#{fid}
select fIP from tb_welding_machine where fid=#{fid}

select s.`fid` fid,s.`fspe_num` welderid,s.finitial finitial,s.farc weldername,s.fcharacter fweld_v_max,s.ftime,s.fhysteresis,s.fadvance,s.fini_ele ,s.fweld_ele,s.farc_ele,s.fweld_tuny_ele,s.farc_tuny_ele,s.ffrequency frequency,s.fgasflow gasflow,s.fwater_cooled_torch ftorch,fwelding_process fprocessid, point_speed,pulse_ratio,thrust_ele,decline_time,rise_time,fweldparameters,pulse,arc_length,manual_weld,fargon,Base_vol1,Base_vol,Base_ele,hand_ele,Rush,handarc_time,handarc_ele,farc_time,firsttime,guide,slope,specialarc,specialarc_rep,ts_condition,pulse_ele,ac_frequency,clean_width,ac_dc,pulse_width,ac_ratio, ac_wave,pulse_tuny_ele,special_arcorder,special_arc_initial,special_arctime,click_ele,two_click_ele,repeat_end FROM tb_specification s where 1=1 AND s.`fmachine_id`=#{machine} AND s.`fspe_num`=#{chanel} ORDER by s.fid

select s.`fid` fid,s.`fspe_num` welderid,s.fselect insname,s.fcharacter fweld_v_max,s.fmaterial updatename,s.fgas fback,s.fdiameter fname,s.fweld_ele,s.fweld_vol,s.fspeed,s.fini_ele,s.fini_vol,s.farc_ele,s.farc_vol,s.fadvance,s.fweld_tuny_ele,s.fweld_tuny_vol,s.farc_speed,s.farc_tuny_speed,s.fselectstep,s.ftime,s.ffrequency,s.fini_tuny_vol,s.farc_tuny_vol FROM tb_specification s where 1=1 AND s.`fmachine_id`=#{machine} AND s.`fspe_num`=#{chanel} ORDER by s.fid
